test.com.xceptance.xlt.common

Class XltMockWebConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.MockWebConnection
      • test.com.xceptance.xlt.common.XltMockWebConnection
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.WebConnection

    public class XltMockWebConnection
extends com.gargoylesoftware.htmlunit.MockWebConnection
    Mocked web connection which provides the same functionalities as its HtmlUnit counterpart.

    The only difference is the post-processing of responses performed by the XltWebClient.
